## UNE Weather Tests


```{r libraies}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r load_data}

gc()
load("./data/weather.Rdata")
```

## Including Plots

Plot

```{r Plot_test, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(data = weather, aes(x = Date2, y = Temp_Out)) +
	geom_line(alpha = 0.5) +
	geom_smooth(na.rm = TRUE, colour = "green", fill = "pink")
	
```
